```{=typst}
// UA Brand Colors
#let ua-blue = rgb("#0C234B")
#let ua-red = rgb("#AB0520")

// Header: logo left, contact info right
#grid(
  columns: (1fr, 1fr),
  align: (left, right),
  [#image("assets/infosci-logo.png", width: 85%)],
  [#text(size: 8.5pt, fill: ua-blue)[
    Your Name, PhD \
    Your Title \
    College of Information Science \
    University of Arizona \
    youremail\@arizona.edu \
    (520) 000-0000
  ]]
)

#v(0.08in)
#line(length: 100%, stroke: 1.5pt + ua-red)
#v(0.2in)

// Date
#text(size: 10pt)[#datetime.today().display("[month repr:long] [day], [year]")]

#v(0.15in)
```
